requirements.intro: A TekStrea client, a healthcare technology company, has an immediate need for a Pega Developer for a remote long term contract.  We're looking for an experienced developer to support defects, issues and development.

requirements.intro: Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the 'Apply' button and sending us your resume.
requirements.content: We're looking for Sr. level backend software engineers that have at least 7 years of writing code for web-based Python applications.
items: You will need at least 3 years of writing Python Django applications and at least 10 years of software engineering experience.

Ideally, you have tenure in all of the companies you've worked for, so you can show growth and technical challenges that you've overcome over time.
